headline: American Express Expands NBA Ties As It Courts Experience Focused Cardholders
summary: American Express (NYSE:AXP) renewed and expanded its multiyear partnership with the NBA, WNBA, NBA G League, USA Basketball, and NBA Take-Two Media. The deal introduces new fan benefits and exclusive perks for American Express card members tied to these basketball properties. The expanded agreement adds more leagues and program elements focused on live experiences and digital engagement for basketball fans. For NYSE:AXP, this move sits at the intersection of payments, entertainment, and...
